channel.title: VLOG on EUC365 | Modern Technology Blog
channel.description: Recent content in VLOG on EUC365 | Modern Technology Blog

item.title: VLOG - Getting Started with Windows 365 Enterprise
item.description: A look into a ‘From th Group Up’ approach to Windows 365, including Licensing, differences in Product SKUs, configuration and also three ways to access Windows 365.

item.title: VLOG - Getting Started with Windows Autopatch
item.description: This video goes over what Windows Autopatch is, and how the tenant enrollment flow happens.

item.title: VLOG - Azure AD Connect Cloud Sync
item.description: What is this video about? This video goes over the configuration of Azure AD Connect Cloud Sync, with some insight into what the differences are with its bigger brother AADC, the Pre-Reqs and some other insights.

item.title: VLOG - Isolate your Hyper V Lab Environment from your network
item.description: My first Vlog Post This video, is the first, of what I hope to be many Vlog’s.
